alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 6:08AM CDT until June 14 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southern Conway County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Yell County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 608 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Atkins, or 8 miles east of Russellville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morrilton... Perryville... Atkins... Pottsville... Oppelo... Menifee... Perry... Houston... Sequoya Park... Hill Creek... Happy Bend... Solgohachia... Hattieville... Petit Jean State Park... Galla Creek WMA... Toad Suck... Plumerville... Bigelow... Fourche... Ada... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
